/usr/bin/c++    -g -O3 -std=c++11     CMakeFiles/kfusion-benchmark-opencl.dir/src/benchmark.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kfusion-benchmark-opencl.dir/src/PowerMonitor.cpp.o  -o kfusion-benchmark-opencl -rdynamic libkfusion-opencl.a -lrt -lstdc++ -lpthread /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libOpenCL.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64
